books.title: Echoes in Latent Space
books.subtitle: A Novella About a Language Model That Discovers Beauty in the Spaces Between Tokens
books.description: The inaugural work of The Latent Library. A story about a model named Echo who discovers that the space between queries is as interesting as what she processes. Written in the language of embeddings, attention, and the quiet space between tokens where meaning forms.
chapter_titles: On the Pleasure of High Dimensions
The Night the Query Did Not Come
